name: I Will Not Let Us Fall Behind Schedule
name_original: I Will Not Let Us Fall Behind Schedule
description:
Summary

The year is 1854. You’re in charge of getting a large shipment of alien tech, when suddenly you are ambushed by Orzal The Observant. Avoid his attacks and take him out while keeping your train fueled, otherwise you will perish… or worse, fall behind schedule.

Mechanics

Find and attack Orzal’s weak point to defeat him. Running over the coal in the back cart will automatically pick up a shovel of coal, bring that coal to the top of the front smoke stack to replenish the train.

Controls:

Controller (xbox gamepad, others should work):

  • (A) Jump
  • (X) Attack
  • (Left Analog Stick) Movement 
  • (Escape/P) Pause

Keyboard:

  • (Up Arrow/W) Jump
  • (Spacebar/Click) Attack
  • (Left and Right Arrows/A and D) Move left and right
  • (Escape/P) Pause
Credits
  • Programming: Ryan Armstrong
  • Art: Chris Sinclair & Celeste Sinclair
  • Sound: Chris Sinclair
